channel.title: Comments on: RETRO: Big Black “Kerosene” live

item.title: By: mee
item.dc:creator: mee
item.description:
That in my house cover rocks hard - ten times better than the original!!
It should be noted Big Black leaned quite heavily towards dance music - be it through Roland, the dancy drum patterns, and similar funky bass. They lifted quite a bit from Kraftwerk (just listen to man-machine) and even the Mary-Jane girls' cover reaffirms that tendency. Though usually they're associated with other scenes.
item.content:encoded:
That in my house cover rocks hard – ten times better than the original!!

It should be noted Big Black leaned quite heavily towards dance music – be it through Roland, the dancy drum patterns, and similar funky bass. They lifted quite a bit from Kraftwerk (just listen to man-machine) and even the Mary-Jane girls’ cover reaffirms that tendency.
Though usually they’re associated with other scenes.

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: Roland really rocks it out live!
